description.en: Discover Real-Time Weather, a User-Friendly Interface, Choose Your Favorite Cities for Your Homepage.
description.fr: Explorez la météo en temps réel avec une interface conviviale.

description.en: Search for a movie, rate its direction or execution, and find the rated titles in the profile section. Retrieve information about movies, including the production company, genres, release date, and duration.
description.fr: Recherchez un film, évaluez sa direction ou son exécution.

description.en: Retrieve all the comics from the Marvel Universe, gather information about characters such as Spider-Man or Hulk, and find out in which series and comics they have appeared. Discover the stories of lesser-known Marvel characters that are unfamiliar to the general public. Implemented in JavaScript and Next.js.
description.fr: Retrouvez tous les comics et les personnages de l'univers Marvel,
